character.statement: Let's go tiny and find the lost compacts!
I would usually caution shrinking to a tiny size. You can trust Polly. Have fun with the Polly Shrink Power!
I'm extremely observant. You went tiny didn't you? Nothing slips by me.
I just love new outfits! You can dress up to look like me, Polly, and Shani. Try on the Polly Pocket Outfits.
Please help Polly find the missing compacts.
